headline: Show HN: Fast way to build digital presence across multiple platforms
description:
Hello,

I am a tech blogger and last year I wanted to have my own website for writing blogs and doing content marketing.

Since I love programming, I could have built the site by myself but I wanted to test the no-code solutions, so after spending sometime researching I ended up going with Wordpress. However i found it tedious and for some reasons, hard and slow.

Anyways, I tried other platforms like Wix too. Problem then came was I had to share my work on social media platforms to get more readers and also post it on hashnode and Medium. It was becoming time consuming and monotonous process.

Hence, I decided to build a solution and the result is Leansence.

It is geared towards bloggers and content marketers. It provides an easy to use website builder with the ability to write blogs and add products, with unlimited bandwidth.

You can also directly post your blog to Medium(hashnode and dev.to support will be added soon) and also share it on twitter( can also split it into threads).

It also has social media tools so you can schedule your Twitter posts and threads. Hence you are getting website builder, blogging ability, as well as social media tools.

I have great ideas for the future and any feedback would be appreciated.
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 在多个平台上建立数字存在的快速方法
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 在多個平臺上建立數字存在的快速方法
description_zh-Hans:
你好，

我是一个技术博客，去年我想拥有自己的网站，用来写博客和做内容营销。

由于我喜欢编程，我可以自己建立网站，但我想测试一下无代码的解决方案，所以在花了一些时间研究后，我最终选择了Wordpress。然而，我发现它很繁琐，而且由于某些原因，它很难做，而且速度很慢。

不管怎样，我也尝试了其他平台，如Wix。然后问题来了，我不得不在社交媒体平台上分享我的作品，以获得更多的读者，同时也在hashnode和Medium上发布作品。

因此，我决定建立一个解决方案，结果就是Leansence。

它面向博客和内容营销人员。 它提供了一个易于使用的网站建设工具，能够编写博客和添加产品，并具有无限的带宽。

你也可以直接将你的博客发布到Medium（hashnode和dev.to支持即将加入），也可以在twitter上分享（也可以将其分成线程）。 因此，你将获得网站建设者、博客能力以及社交媒体工具。

我对未来有很好的想法，希望得到任何反馈。
